name: Firework Simulator (Classic)
description:
Make firework rockets with the power of science

Using precalculated formulas, make fireworks in one of six colors, and customize your explosions with a 7x7 grid.

Firework Simulator came out of a project I made for my chemistry class this year, and was my first finished game project ever, so excuse any sub-par coding or ideas. I'm currently working on Firework Simulator 2 that'll have original music, and a lot more customization options. It's almost done, so check back every now and then to see if it's out.
